title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7903.3 - Issuance of denial orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7903.3 - Issuance of denial orders

State Regulations
(a) Upon determining that an application for assignment should be denied pursuant
to Part 7901 of this subchapter, the State Energy Office shall issue a denial
order in writing naming the applicant. (b) The order shall include a brief statement
summarizing the basis upon which the application is denied. The order shall
provide that any person aggrieved thereby may file an appeal with the State

Energy Office in accordance with Part 7904 of this subchapter. (c) The State Energy Office shall serve a
copy of the order by mail upon the applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7903.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
